name: contract-puller
description: CLI tool to fetch smart contract source code from Etherscan or Blockscout APIs

scripts.build:sea: node --experimental-sea-config sea-config.json && rm -f contract-puller && cp $(command -v node) contract-puller && chmod +w contract-puller && codesign --remove-signature contract-puller && npx -y postject contract-puller NODE_SEA_BLOB sea-prep.blob --sentinel-fuse NODE_SEA_FUSE_fce680ab2cc467b6e072b8b5df1996b2 --macho-segment-name NODE_SEA && codesign --sign - contract-puller
